survey_brief: This survey aims to understand the adoption, challenges, and satisfaction levels of healthcare providers using telehealth services. The insights will help improve service offerings and address barriers to telehealth implementation.

questions.question_text: How long has your practice been using telehealth services?
answer_options: We do not currently use telehealth
questions.client_notes: This question helps segment respondents based on their experience with telehealth. Keep options clear and mutually exclusive.
questions.scripter_notes: Use a single-choice radio button setup for this question.

script.question_text: How long has your practice been using telehealth services?
answer_options: We do not currently use telehealth

questions.question_text: What are the primary reasons your practice adopted telehealth services? (Select all that apply)
questions.routing_logic: Only appears if Q1 is not 'We do not currently use telehealth'.
questions.client_notes: This question identifies key drivers for telehealth adoption. Allow for multiple selections and an 'Other' option to capture unique responses.
questions.scripter_notes: Use a multi-choice checkbox setup with an optional open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What are the primary reasons your practice adopted telehealth services? (Select all that apply)
script.routing_logic: Only appears if Q1 is not 'We do not currently use telehealth'.

questions.question_text: What challenges have you faced in implementing telehealth services?
questions.routing_logic: Only appears if Q1 is not 'We do not currently use telehealth'.
questions.client_notes: This open-ended question allows providers to detail specific challenges. Ensure the text box is large enough for detailed responses.
questions.scripter_notes: Use an open-text field for this question.

script.question_text: What challenges have you faced in implementing telehealth services?
script.routing_logic: Only appears if Q1 is not 'We do not currently use telehealth'.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the current telehealth platform your practice uses?
questions.routing_logic: Only appears if Q1 is not 'We do not currently use telehealth'.
questions.client_notes: This question measures satisfaction levels. Use a balanced 5-point Likert scale for accurate sentiment analysis.
questions.scripter_notes: Use a single-choice radio button setup for this question.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the current telehealth platform your practice uses?
script.routing_logic: Only appears if Q1 is not 'We do not currently use telehealth'.

questions.question_text: What features would you like to see improved in your telehealth platform?
questions.routing_logic: Only appears if Q4 is 'Dissatisfied' or 'Very dissatisfied'.
questions.client_notes: This open-ended question helps identify areas for improvement. Encourage respondents to be specific about desired features.
questions.scripter_notes: Use an open-text field for this question.

script.question_text: What features would you like to see improved in your telehealth platform?
script.routing_logic: Only appears if Q4 is 'Dissatisfied' or 'Very dissatisfied'.

questions.question_text: What is the primary reason your practice has not adopted telehealth services?
questions.routing_logic: Only appears if Q1 is 'We do not currently use telehealth'.
questions.client_notes: This question identifies barriers to telehealth adoption. Include an 'Other' option to capture unique responses.
questions.scripter_notes: Use a single-choice radio button setup with an optional open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What is the primary reason your practice has not adopted telehealth services?
script.routing_logic: Only appears if Q1 is 'We do not currently use telehealth'.
